summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SuriRentals new Kasgeld and Onderhoud features. Backend APIs working perfectly (22/22 tests passed). Frontend navigation and core functionality working well. Minor UI interaction issues with modal dropdowns but all features are functional.

ui_bugs.component: Modal dropdowns in Kasgeld and Onderhoud forms
ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepting pointer events, requiring force=True for clicks
ui_bugs.workaround: Use force=True for dropdown interactions in modals

passed_tests: Dashboard loads and displays Kasgeld Saldo
Kasgeld page loads with balance cards (Totaal Saldo, Stortingen, Opnames, Onderhoudskosten)
Kasgeld deposit creation (storting) - modal opens and form works
Kasgeld withdrawal creation (opname) - transaction type selection works
Onderhoud page loads with total costs summary
Onderhoud modal opens for new maintenance record
Maintenance form fields present (apartment, category, description, cost, date, status)
Dashboard integration - Kasgeld balance calculation includes maintenance costs
Maintenance cost deduction from Kasgeld balance (verified in backend)
All existing functionality still working (tenants, apartments, payments, deposits)
Navigation between all pages including new Kasgeld and Onderhoud sections
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvement needed: Fix modal overlay issues in dropdown selections within Kasgeld and Onderhoud forms to improve user experience. Consider adding z-index adjustments or click event handling improvements.

success_percentage.backend: 100% (22/22 tests passed including 8 new Kasgeld/Onderhoud endpoints)
success_percentage.frontend: 90% (all core functionality working, minor modal interaction issues)
